title: Digging Into Node.js
author: Kyle Simpson
description: Node.js has taken the JavaScript world by storm, but where do you start when all you see are tens of thousands of packages/frameworks on npm? The best place to start is always at the foundation, and that's what this course focuses on. In this course, youâ€™ll get to know the fundamental concepts in Node.js: CLI programming, file system access, streams, HTTP servers & routing, database persistence, and child processes.
